item.description:
The band Remember September is playing down at Captain’s cove this Sunday September 9th at 3:00pm. The nice thing about the Cove
is if it’s raining they setup inside so rain or shine the boys will be playing. This is the band that got rained out at a pass meetup we went to at Walnut beach so this is a good chance to get to see them finish their show. Also not too many more bands on Sunday down at the Cove so let get our dancing shoes on and dance the afternoon away. Hope to see you all there.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: REMEMBER SEPTEMBER SUNDAY AT CAPTAIN'S COVE
